availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Thompson (Kenton Co store owner)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, merchant. Indiana native. Kenton County, Kentucky, store owner. Married to Sarah Thompson. Father of James Thompson. Fined for selling alcohol to an enslaved person in 1861. Fined for serving liquor to a minor in Covington, Kentucky in 1862.

ab.bibl:
KYR-0001-020-1491. KYR-0001-004-2166.
Find A Grave, "George Washington Thompson (1824-1902)," Memorial #90471559, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90471559 (accessed November 16, 2019).
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton, Covington Ward 4, p.236B.
